content: NEW YORK  Sept 10 A federal judge on Thursday narrowed several lawsuits against American International Group Inc by shareholders who opted out of the $970.5 million class-action settlement that she approved in March over the insurer's 2008 bailout.
name: American International Group Inc
title: AIG wins narrowing of shareholder lawsuits over 2008 bailout

content: NEW YORK  Sept 9 A U.S. appeals court on Wednesday rejected efforts by American International Group Inc  and Bank of New York Mellon Corp to recoup hundreds of millions of dollars of foreign tax credits that the Internal Revenue Service did not allow.
name: American International Group Inc
title: U.S. court rejects AIG  Bank of NY Mellon tax credit appeals

content: NEW YORK An American International Group Inc  unit on Thursday asked a federal judge to order a Pennsylvania firm to pay it $1.76 billion in damages for allegedly overcharging for life insurance policies acquired from elderly individuals.
name: American International Group Inc
title: AIG seeking $1.76 billion in 'life settlements' trial in New York

content: NEW YORK  Aug 26 An American International Group Inc unit on Thursday asked a federal judge to order a Pennsylvania firm to pay it $1.76 billion in damages for allegedly overcharging for life insurance policies acquired from elderly individuals.
name: American International Group Inc
title: AIG seeking $1.76 bln in 'life settlements' trial in New York

content: WASHINGTON  Aug 12 The United States filed an appeal on Wednesday against a U.S. judge's ruling in June that sided with former American International Group chief executive Maurice "Hank" Greenberg on a legal claim over the company's 2008 bailout.
name: American International Group Inc
title: U.S. government appeals judge's ruling over 2008 AIG bailout

content: Aug 3 Insurer American International Group Inc  reported a 5.6 percent jump in quarterly operating profit  driven by investments in one of China's biggest insurers and earnings from aircraft leasing company AerCap.
name: American International Group Inc
title: AIG profit lifted by AerCap  China investment; raises buyback

content: WASHINGTON/NEW YORK  June 15 A U.S. judge on Monday awarded no damages to American International Group Inc  shareholders led by former CEO Maurice "Hank" Greenberg in their lawsuit against the U.S. government  despite finding that the U.S. Federal Reserve exceeded its authority in the insurer's 2008 bailout.
name: American International Group Inc
title: Judge rules for ex-AIG CEO Greenberg over 2008 bailout  but no damages

content: WASHINGTON  June 16 Former American International Group chief executive Maurice "Hank" Greenberg will appeal a U.S. judge's ruling that awarded him and other shareholders no damages over the company's 2008 bailout  his company Starr International Co said in a statement on Tuesday.
name: American International Group Inc
title: Ex-AIG CEO Greenberg says will appeal bailout ruling

content: NEW YORK  June 18 A decade-old lawsuit in which New York accused former American International Group Inc  Chief Executive Maurice "Hank" Greenberg of accounting fraud will head to the state's highest court for a second time  likely delaying for several months a trial that had been set for June 25.
name: American International Group Inc
title: NY case against ex-AIG CEO Greenberg heads back to top state court

content: WASHINGTON/NEW YORK  June 15 A U.S. judge on Monday awarded no damages to American International Group Inc  shareholders led by former chief executive Maurice "Hank" Greenberg in their lawsuit against the U.S. government  despite finding that the U.S. Federal Reserve exceeded its authority in the insurer's 2008 bailout.
name: American International Group Inc
title: UPDATE 4-Judge rules for ex-AIG CEO Greenberg over bailout  but no damages

content: WASHINGTON  June 15 A U.S. judge on Monday ruled the U.S. government does not owe Maurice "Hank" Greenberg and other American International Group shareholders any damages over the company's 2008 bailout.
name: American International Group Inc
title: U.S. judge tosses damages bid by ex-AIG CEO Greenberg over 2008 bailout

content: TAIPEI American International Group Inc (AIG)  said it would sell a portion of its insurance business in Taiwan to a local firm Nan Shan Life Insurance Co Ltd for $158 million.
name: American International Group Inc
title: AIG to sell part of Taiwan unit to Nan Shan Life for $158 million

content: TAIPEI  June 11 American International Group Inc (AIG) said it would sell a portion of its insurance business in Taiwan to a local firm Nan Shan Life Insurance Co Ltd for $158 million.
name: American International Group Inc
title: UPDATE 1-AIG to sell part of Taiwan unit to Nan Shan Life for $158 mln

content: TAIPEI  June 11 Taiwan's Nan Shan Life Insurance Co Ltd will buy a portion of the insurance business of American International Group Inc's (AIG) subsidiary in Taiwan for $158 million  the unlisted Taiwanese insurance company said on Thursday.
name: American International Group Inc
title: Nan Shan Life to buy part of AIG's Taiwan unit for $158 mln

content: NEW YORK  April 30 American International Group Inc's first-quarter earnings fell slightly as low interest rates and weaker returns from alternative investments offset improvements in its commercial insurance business.
name: American International Group Inc
title: AIG first quarter earnings down slightly on interest rates  returns

content: WASHINGTON  April 22 The U.S. government was "punitive" in its bailout of American International Group Inc in 2008  a lawyer for the company's former chief executive argued during closing arguments of a trial that may impact how much flexibility regulators will have when they respond to future financial crises.
name: American International Group Inc
title: U.S bailout of AIG in 2008 was 'punitive ' ex-CEO's lawyer says

content: NEW YORK In a last-ditch effort to avoid trial  former American International Group Inc Chairman Maurice "Hank" Greenberg is seeking permission to ask New York’s highest court to throw out the accounting fraud case against him.
name: American International Group Inc
title: Ex-AIG chief Greenberg in last-ditch bid to avoid trial

content: NEW YORK American International Group Inc  has reached a $40 million settlement of claims it should not have let employees invest their retirement savings in company stock as the insurer headed into the 2008 financial crisis  which nearly caused its collapse.
name: American International Group Inc
title: AIG in $40 mln accord over crisis-era retirement plan losses

content: NEW YORK  April 23 American International Group Inc has reached a $40 million settlement of claims that it should not have offered company stock as an investment option in its retirement plans  because the stock was an imprudent investment.
name: American International Group Inc
title: AIG reaches $40 mln settlement over retirement plans

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  March 04 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings assigns a rating of 'BBB+' to American  International Group  Inc.'s (AIG) new issuance of approximately $350 million  4.35% senior notes due 2045.  KEY RATING DRIVERS  This new issue is rated equivalent to the ratings of AIG's existing senior debt  and was sold in the Taiwan market. Proceeds from the issue will be used for  general corporate purposes  which may include the retirement of existing d
name: American International Group Inc
title: Fitch Rates AIG's New Sr. Unsecured Notes 'BBB+'

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  March 02 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed American International  Group  Inc.'s ratings  including the long-term IDR at 'A-'. Fitch has also  affirmed the ratings on AIG's senior debt obligations at 'BBB+'. Additionally   Fitch has affirmed the Insurer Financial Strength (IFS) ratings of AIG's rated  property/casualty insurance subsidiaries at 'A' and the IFS ratings of the  company's U.S. life insurance subsidiaries led by A
name: American International Group Inc
title: Fitch Revises AIG's Rating Outlook to Positive; Affirms 'A-' IDR

content: NEW YORK  Feb 27 Robert Benmosche  who took the helm of insurer American International Group after a massive government bailout at the height of the financial crisis  died on Friday at 70 after a battle with lung cancer.
name: American International Group Inc
title: UPDATE 3-Former AIG head Benmosche dies; led insurer after bailout

name: American International Group Inc
title: A

content: Feb 27 Robert Benmosche  former president and chief executive officer of insurer American International Group   died Friday at 70  the company said in a statement.
name: American International Group Inc
title: CORRECTED-OFFICIAL-Former AIG head Benmosche dies at 70
